dk.pervasive.jcaf
Interface EntityListener

All Known Subinterfaces:
Entity
All Known Implementing Classes:
GenericEntity, GenericRestEntity, Person, Place, PolledEntityListener, RemoteEntityListenerWrapper, RestPerson, RestPlace
public interface EntityListener

Implementations of this interface receives notification about changes to the context of an Entity. This is the local version of a listener interface.

Author:
Jakob Bardram
See Also:
RemoteEntityListener, Entity, ContextService

Method Summary
 void contextChanged(ContextEvent event)
          Notification about changes in an entity's context information.
